subject: Eclipse/JUnit4.0
msgSnippet: Hi, I have JUnit 3.8.1, as a plug-in, now if I update the plug-in would I be able to upgrade to JUnit4.0? Thanks, -Kamal. [Non-text portions of this message
messageBody:
Hi,

I have JUnit 3.8.1, as a plug-in, now if I update the plug-in would I be
able to upgrade to JUnit4.0?

Thanks,

-Kamal.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
